title: Temple Supplies

properties.name: description
properties.value: Temple Supplies is the rewards shop for the Guardians of the Rift minigame, accessed by talking to Apprentice Felix at the minigame's entrance. At the rewards shop, players can use the abyssal pearls earned in the minigame to purchase helpful items for training Runecrafting.

content:
Temple Supplies
Released23 March 2022 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationTemple of the Eye
OwnerApprentice Felix
SpecialtyGuardians of the Rift rewards
Location

Temple Supplies is the rewards shop for the Guardians of the Rift minigame, accessed by talking to Apprentice Felix at the minigame's entrance. At the rewards shop, players can use the abyssal pearls earned in the minigame to purchase helpful items for training Runecrafting.

Talismans whose altars require quests to access do not appear in the shop if the respective quest has not been completed.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 March 2022
(update)

The amount of Abyssal pearls required to purchase pieces of the Raiments of the Eye outfit has been reduced:

  • Hat of the eye (reduced to 400 from 500)
  • Robe top of the eye (reduced to 350 from 400)
  • Robe bottoms of the eye (reduced to 350 from 400)
  • Boots of the eye (reduced to 250 from 300)
